name_original: Chromatic Commotion [DOWNLOAD FROM GAME PAGE, NOT SUBMISSION PAGE]
description:
READ ALL OF IT OR YOU WON'T KNOW HOW TO PLAY

Get to the top! Diagonally striped blocks send you upwards, vertically striped blocks send you downwards. Don't touch the edge of the screen. You are affected by gravity while moving vertically, but not while moving horizontally. You'll understand it once you play it!

WARNING: The game has not been tested on linux

WARNING 2: On windows, when you press quit, the game crashes instead. Have task manager at the ready :)

WARNING 3: The game has A LOT of flashing colours!

Controls: 

A of LEFT to dash left
D or RIGHT to dash right
R to go to last checkpoint
O to go to the beginning of the level and reset checkpoints
ESC to go to main menu.  

Assets used:

An modified version of this script: https://github.com/SebLague/2DPlatformer-Tutorial/blob/master/Platformer%20E08/Assets/Scripts/Controller2D.cs

Tools Used:

Unity, Visual Studio, Paint.NET, Bosca Ceoil, Audacity.
